title: Middle East Crisis: Live Updates: Netanyahu Offers Full-Throated Defense of Gaza War
content: The Israeli prime minister portrayed the war in Gaza as a “clash between barbarism and civilization” and declared “we will win.” He called antiwar protesters outside the Capitol “Iran’s useful idiots.”

title: Fatah and Hamas Sign Unity Deal in China, but Deep Divisions Remain

title: New Zealand Abuse in Care Report Speaks of ‘National Catastrophe’

title: Israel Risks All-Out War With Hezbollah. A Truce in Gaza May Reduce That Threat.
